data.name: Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: That pirate will be done for, when he falls into our trap!
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: We're a club of tuneful rovers!
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: We can sing in every clef!
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: We can even hit the high notes!
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: It's just too bad we're tone deaf!
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: A pirate I was meant to be! (Verse 1)
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: Trim the sails and roam the sea! (Verse 1)
data.requires: |Come on, men! We've got to recover that map!|

data.name: Let's go defeat that evil pirate!
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: We know he's sure to lose, ´cause we know just where to fire at!
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: We're thieving balladeers.
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: A gang of cutthroat mugs.
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: To fight us off ye don't need guns!
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: Just jolly good ear plugs!
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: A pirate I was meant to be! (Verse 2)
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: Trim the sails and roam the sea! (Verse 2)
data.requires: |Let's go defeat that evil pirate!|

data.name: All right, crew, let's get to work!
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: Our vocation is a thing we love, a thing we'd never shirk.
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: We'll fight you in the harbor.
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: We'll battle you on land.
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: When you meet singing pirates...
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: They'll be more than you can stand.
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: Ooooh! That was a good one!
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: No, it wasn't.
data.requires: |All right, crew, let's get to work!|

data.name: No time for song! We've got to move!
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: The battle will be long, but our courage we will prove!
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: We're a pack a´ scurvy sea dogs.
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: Have we pity? Not a dram!
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: We all eat roasted garlic...
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: ...then sing from the diaphragm!
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: A pirate I was meant to be! (Verse 4)
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: Trim the sails and roam the sea! (Verse 4)
data.requires: |No time for song! We've got to move!|

data.name: Less singing, more sailing.
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: When we defeat our wicked foe, his ship he will be bailing!
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: If ye try ta fight us...
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: ...you will get a nasty whackin´!
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: If ya disrespect our singing´...
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: ...we will feed ya to a kraken!
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: A pirate I was meant to be! (Verse 5)
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: Trim the sails and roam the sea! (Verse 5)
data.requires: |Less singing, more sailing.| and |@Lyrics:2|

data.name: I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: We're ready to set sail, through the cannons need a priming.
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: We're troublesome corsairs!
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: And we've come to steal your treasures!
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: We would shoot you on the downbeat...
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: ...but we gotta rest five measures.
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: A pirate I was meant to be! (Verse 6)
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: Trim the sails and roam the sea! (Verse 6)
data.requires: |I´m getting so sick of you guys and your rhyming.| and |@Lyrics:3|

data.name: Stop! Stop! Stop!
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: The brass is what we'll polish and the deck is what we'll mop.
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: You say you're nasty pirates...
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: ...scheming, thieving, bad bushwhackers?
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: From what I've seen I tell you...
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: ...you're not pirates! You're just slackers!
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: A pirate I was meant to be! (Verse 7)
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|

data.name: Trim the sails and roam the sea! (Verse 7)
data.requires: |Stop! Stop! Stop!| and |@Lyrics:4|
